title.div: Now Available: Foreign Relations of the United States, 1981–1988, Volume XI, START I

author.name: Office of the Historian, U.S. Department of State

div.p: This volume is the first of two volumes devoted to the START I agreement with the Soviet Union to reduce and limit strategic offensive arms. This volume documents the negotations and internal U.S. deliberations during the Reagan administration.

link.title: Book Cover of Foreign Relations of the United States, 1981–1988, Volume XI, START I
